title: Hate Me
lyrics:
I, threw a glass at the mirror
You told me that's bad luck
To make myself different
I just don't give a fuck
I, push you to your limit
So many times that I can't keep count

But all I wanna do is, keep you around



I don't know, I don't know, I don't know what I'm doing

But I don't

Yeah I know, yeah I know, yeah I know what I'm doing



There's a way you hate me, hate me, hate me, hate me, hate me

Yeah it makes me, makes me, makes me, makes me, makes me

When it want ya, want ya, want ya, want ya, want ya

When you hate me, hate me



I, press all your buttons

Just so I can work them off

It's not an assumption

I know it's all my fault

Tried, meditation for breakfast

But it didn't do much for me

Cause my hunger is reckless, there's something crazy



I don't know, I don't know, I don't know what I'm doing

But I don't

Yeah I know, yeah I know, yeah I know what I'm doing



There's a way you hate me, hate me, hate me, hate me, hate me

Yeah it makes me, makes me, makes me, makes me, makes me

When it want ya, want ya, want ya, want ya, want ya

When you hate me, hate me



Hate me

Hate me

Make me (make me, make me, make me)

Makes me, makes me (makes me, makes me, makes me)

When it want ya, want ya (want ya, want ya, want ya)

Hate me



There's a way you hate me, hate me, hate me, hate me, hate me

Yeah it makes me, makes me, makes me, makes me, makes me

When it want ya, want ya, want ya, want ya, want ya

When you hate me, hate me
